mapper.update: update metadata_locks set OBJECT_TYPE = #{OBJECT_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_SCHEMA = #{OBJECT_SCHEMA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_NAME = #{OBJECT_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLUMN_NAME = #{COLUMN_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCK_TYPE = #{LOCK_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCK_DURATION = #{LOCK_DURATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCK_STATUS = #{LOCK_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{SOURCE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_THREAD_ID = #{OWNER_THREAD_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER_EVENT_ID = #{OWNER_EVENT_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} where OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN = #{OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_SCHEMA, OBJECT_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, LOCK_TYPE, LOCK_DURATION, LOCK_STATUS, SOURCE, OWNER_THREAD_ID, OWNER_EVENT_ID from metadata_locks where OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN = #{OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN,jdbcType=BIGINT}
